Text:
Installation procedure:


/done mainly for non-problematic work with AVCHD files...  .MTS/

A.

Firstly, run from folder "Prerequisities"
- Microsoft .NET Framework 4 Setup :
en_.net_framework_4_full_x86_x64_508940.exe

use

Windows 
Update to update  .NET Pramework 4 



B.

Instal the latests Direct X - DirectX End-User Runtime:
 /for Polish language it would be:
http://www.microsoft.com/pl-pl/download/confirmation.aspx?id=35



C.

Perform standard installation procedure:


1. Pixie vmob

2. Avid Studio
/choose "Register later"/

/I HAD TO CHaNGE TEMPORARILY the system date to  06-2011 to see this option/




later...



D.

Download and run Avid Studio 1.1 Patch


http://cdnexpress.pinnaclesys.com/SupportFiles/Avid_Studio/Update.exe



E.

Download and run "patch":

http://cdn.pinnaclesys.com/SupportFiles/AvidStudio/hotfix.exe



F.
Replace  the old library "H264VidEncodeApi.dll" situated  here:


C:Program Files (x86)AvidStudioprograms (64bit)   or   C:Program FilesAvidStudioprograms (32bit)


with this one 

downloaded from that link:

http://cdn.pinnaclesys.com/SupportFiles/FAQ_Links/avid_studio/413381/H264VidEncodeApi.dll

--------------------------------------------------

For other issues read - Avid Knowledge Base:


http://avid.force.com/pkb/articles/en_US/FAQ/en415551?retURL=%2Farticles%2Fen_US%2FFAQ%2Fen410211%3FretURL%3D%252Farticles%252Fen_US%252FFAQ%252Fen410211%26popup%3Dtrue&popup=true
